TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConvertible

summary.span: 定義方法，該方法會將實作參考的值或 實值類型轉換成具有等值的 Common Language Runtime 類型。

span.span: Defines methods that convert the value of the implementing reference or value type to a common language runtime type that has an equivalent value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面會提供方法來實作的型別執行個體的值轉換成具有等值的 common language runtime 類型。This interface provides methods to convert the value of an instance of an implementing type to a common language runtime type that has an equivalent value. Common language runtime 類型所， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The common language runtime types are , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 如果沒有任何有意義的轉換，以通用語言執行階段類型，則在特定介面方法實作會擲回。If there is no meaningful conversion to a common language runtime type, then a particular interface method implementation throws . 比方說，如果此介面實作根據布林值類型，實作方法擲回例外狀況，因為沒有不具意義等同於布林值的型別。For example, if this interface is implemented on a Boolean type, the implementation of the method throws an exception because there is no meaningful equivalent to a Boolean type. 通用語言執行平台通常會公開介面透過類別。The common language runtime typically exposes the interface through the class. Common language runtime 也會使用介面就內部而言，在明確介面實作中，以簡化用來支援轉換中的程式碼類別和基本的 common language runtime 類型。The common language runtime also uses the interface internally, in explicit interface implementations, to simplify the code used to support conversions in the class and basic common language runtime types. 除了介面，.NET Framework 會提供呼叫使用者定義資料型別轉換成其他資料類型的類型轉換器的類別。In addition to the interface, the .NET Framework provides classes called type converters for converting user-defined data types to other data types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 通用類型轉換](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)主題。For more information, see the [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada) topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作複數類別，讓它可以轉換做為第一個，然後再呼叫靜態上的成員。The following code sample demonstrates an implementation of for a Complex number class, allowing it to be cast first as a and then calling the static members on that . [!code-cpp[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/CPP/iconvertible.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/CS/iconvertible.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/VB/iconvertible.vb#1)]

span.para: 如果您實作介面，您的實作將會自動呼叫方法如果參數是您實作型別的執行個體和參數是在 common language runtime型別。類型的參數，大部分的轉換方法都，表示可能是目前的文化特性 () 或特定文化特性。大部分的情況下，基底類型的實作會忽略這個參數。不過，您可以選擇是否要在您的程式碼中使用它。

If you implement the interface, your implementation will be called automatically by the method if the parameter is an instance of your implementing type and the parameter is a common language runtime type. Most conversion methods have a parameter of type that represents either the current culture () or a specific culture. For the most part, the implementations of the base types ignore this parameter. However, you can choose whether to use it in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.TypeCode GetTypeCode() cil managed

span.span: Returns the for this instance.

returns.span: 列舉常數，該常數是實作這個介面的類型或實值型別的 。

span.span: The enumerated constant that is the of the class or value type that implements this interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ToBoolean(class System.IFormatProvider provider) cil managed
Public Function ToBoolean (provider As IFormatProvider) As Boolean

param.name: provider
param.span: 介面實作，提供特定文化特性的格式資訊。

span.span: An interface implementation that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定的特定文化特性 (Culture) 之格式資訊，將這個執行個體的值轉換為相等的布林 (Boolean) 值。

span.span: Converts the value of this instance to an equivalent Boolean value using the specified culture-specific formatting information.

returns.span: 布林值，等於這個執行個體的值。

span.span: A Boolean value equivalent to the value of this instance.
